description: This is an awesome bike park with trails, jumps and obstacles for all skill levels. The site is maintained by the  Surrey Off-Road Cycling Enthusiasts Society: http://sorce.gotdns.com/main.html
directions: The South Surrey Mountain Bike Park is located in the forested area west of the South Surrey Athletic Park near Softball City. It lies between 20th and 24th Avenues and is west of 148th Street. You will see a tall concrete water tower and a metal cell phone tower. The park is in that general area. Plenty of paved parking is available near the site.
title: South Surrey Bike Park
